attributes.action: increase teachers' pay immediately, paying NQTs a minimum of £25,000 oustide London, rising to £30,000 after the first year and continuing to rise above the rate of inflation annually thereafter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, teachers' salaries do not reflect the many hours worked or the difficult and sometimes distressing nature of the job. Likewise, no significant payrise has been given since the introduction of the Every Child Matters agenda, which increases teachers' responsibilities and duties.
